attributes.action: allow competing supermarkets open in towns where only one resides.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If one lives in a town where only one supermarket is allowed because the other three are too close, the monopoly can be taken advantage of - and prices are increased. I know this because my local supermarket does just this. I urge the Prime Minister to allow towns that have only one free slot for a supermarket, as it were, to open the competition up for others. This would be especially useful in my town, where nearly all of the local businesses are owned by millionaires, who are unlikely to be affected by the competition.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
